column4: Hi, i seem to be having an audio problem. I cannot get any sort of audio, when ever i play something in Amarok all the meters and everything move like the song is suppose to be playing, yet i dont hear anything. Anyone know what would cause this?
I think #kubuntu can help you more. AmaroK is a KDE app
i was just using that as an example. No sound works at all on my system.
